name: Junald's Blog Engine
tagline: Creating a blog using Jekyll syntax and Github hosting.
body:
Hi! I am Junald Pascua and I'm trying to build my own blog engine. Obviously, I can't start from scratch from now because my learning is still limited. Meantime, I will use Jekyll markdown language to create a blog which is hosted free by Github pages. I am now on my adventure of creating a blog.

Join me! Thank you for reading.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
